verses.roman:
prabhu bale--vaisa tine kariye bhojana
ācārya kahe--āmi kariba pariveśana

synonyms: prabhu bale—Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu said; vaisa—sit down; tine—in the three places; kariye—do; bhojana—eating; ācārya kahe—Advaita Ācārya replied; āmi kariba pariveśana—I shall distribute.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu said, "Let Us sit down in these three places, and We shall take prasāda." However, Advaita Ācārya said, "I shall distribute the prasāda."
